name: perma-js-sdk
description: A JavaScript library to interact with Perma.cc's REST API

scripts.test-local: export NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED='0'; NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --runInBand --testTimeout=90000 --setupFiles dotenv/config
scripts.docgen: jsdoc2md index.js > doc/index.md; jsdoc2md types.js > doc/types.md

author: Harvard Library Innovation Lab
